mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony of the Universiade is in Nanshan District.
sentences.chinese: 大運會開幕式在南山區。

sentences.english: The company's headquarters and R&D base are located in Hi-Tech Industrial Park, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 公司的總部和研發基地位於深圳市南山區科技園。

sentences.english: Address: 5th Floor, Garden City Centre, Nanhai Boulevard, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳，南山區，南海大道，花園城中心，五樓。

sentences.english: Mulinzi situated at the mountainous region of southwestern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 木林子自然保護區位於鄂西南山區。

sentences.english: The representative office of CLNG is located at Ming Wah International Convention Centre in Nanshan, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 代表處設立在深圳市南山區明華國際會議中心。
